channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This Industry Bets on Mass Immigration
item.description: More secure borders, stepped-up interior enforcement and closer scrutiny of guest worker programs have been something of a trifecta for American worke...

item.title: Notable and Admirable: This Small Town Just Became First in its Blue State to sign 287(g) Agreement
item.description: The small town of Wells, Maine, has entered into a 287(g) agreement with ICE. In doing so, Wells has decided to prioritize the safety and security of ...

item.title: Trump’s chaotic economy is causing headaches for Democrats in New Jersey's governor race
item.description: The crowded contest in the Garden State shows how hard it is to address pocketbook issues.

item.title: DHS Secretary Noem says Death Penalty on Table after Fatal Migrant Boat Tragedy
item.description: Following the deaths of at least three migrants as a smuggling boat capsized off the coast of California, Secretary Noem called for the death penalty ...

item.title: Vicious Venezuelan Gang Attacks Police in Times Square
item.description: A recent assault by Tren de Aragua members on NYPD officers in Times Square is yet another example of the abject failure of open borders and sanctuary...

item.title: Warren Buffett shocks shareholders by announcing his intention to retire at the end of the year
item.description: Earlier, Buffett warned Saturday about the dire global consequences of President Donald Trump's tariffs.

item.title: ‘Anything can happen’: Trump doesn't seem fazed by recession worries
item.description: Trump has blamed shaky economic numbers on his predecessor.

item.title: Democrats look to Trump's poor economic numbers with anxious optimism
item.description: Following its latest round of focus groups, Navigator Research is urging Democrats to proactively push their own economic policies.

item.title: Warning signs for Trump as pessimistic outlook on the economy grows among Americans
item.description: Trump’s winning issue is becoming one of his biggest liabilities as multiple polls this week reveal growing disapproval numbers on the economy.
